Dependencies

SASS

$ sudo gem install sass

NODE JS

Download and install in this page http://nodejs.org/

GULP

$npm install gulp -g

Install

Clone the project

$ git clone git@github.com:dbeff/frontendler.git

Install project dependencies

$ npm install

Run Frontendler

Watch

$ gulp watch

Build

$ gulp build

Frontendler by Daniel Beff
